short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hits the go button continuously on the Openstack instances page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Made for Cardiff University's OpenStack cloud development platform.

Automatically refreshes the log page every 2 seconds for any instance on OpenStack.
